title: Diabetic Nerve Pain Treatment
subtitle: Discover the best treatment program that will take you from the pain you're living today to a beautiful state where you can enjoy life. Treat the pain and enjoy your life.
instructor-desc-1: A consultant and global expert in pain treatment, especially neuropathic pain, from the University of Toronto, Canada. He has published many scientific papers in prestigious medical journals.
instructor-desc-2: Author of several specialized books on pain management.
instructor-exp: Member of the Canadian Pain Society.
instructor-patients: Founder and head of pain treatment units in several countries.
instructor-awards: Over 30 years of experience treating thousands of cases.
goal-2: The integrated treatment program that achieved the best results
goal-3: Real patient stories whose lives were transformed
audience-title: This Webinar is for Diabetic Patients
audience-1: You've seen doctors and taken medications but are still unhappy with the results.
audience-2: You suffer from burning pain in your legs and hands.
audience-4: Difficulty sleeping and not enjoying your life.
